entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 6:49 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -16.7°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning except plus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain along parts of the coast overnight. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm along parts of the coast. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm except 5 mm along parts of the coast. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy except snow inland and over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
